remarks: Finite commutative sums in a power structure are taken componentwise. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ pwsgsum as of 9-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
pwsgsumOLD.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` Y ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. W ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CMnd ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. I /\ y e. J ) ) -> U e. B ) $.
pwsgsumOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
pwsgsumOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( Y gsum ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( R gsum ( y e. J |-> U ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
